# Galley of the Hungry Sailor
## Overview
**Aura** moderate conjuration; **CL** 11th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 50,000 gp

**Weight** 1,000 lbs.

**Description**

This special galley eliminates the need for cooking fires and allows the crew to eat fresh, if somewhat bland, meals rather than dried rations. The *galley of the hungry sailor* produces food capable of feeding up to 100 people 3 nutritious meals per day.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Create Food and Water (Spell)|create food and water]]**,* *[[Prestidigitation (Spell)|prestidigitation]]*

**Cost** 25,000 gp

**Source:** Razor Coast: Fire As She Bears (Frog God Games), pg. 54
